website_summaries.verdict: Fast-charging battery in a lightweight handheld vacuum that will deliver better than average performance.
pros: Ships with a crevice tool and a turbo tool to help you reach tough areas successfully
Includes a power indicator light, so you know when it's time to recharge the battery
Charger for the battery will deliver the desired power faster than older versions of this style of handheld vacuum
cons: Only uses a 16-volt battery, so it's not as powerful as some other handheld vacuums

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son for Christmas. He says it is Awesome. And works Surprisingly well. He has used it on stairs and furniture and loves it! I will probably buy one for myself. I spent days reading reviews before I decided to go with this one. I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Cat fur is gone!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it one day but I'm so impressed I have to post now. Great on pet fur. I have a black medium-haired cat. I have imbeded fur on my light tan sheets. Several times I've used packing tape to try to remove them. I've washed them several times. No sucess. This dust buster removed them on the first swipe. I used the upholstery attachment. I highly recommend this dust buster.
customer_reviews.author: EightTrack

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Purchase Filters & So-So Suction
customer_reviews.text: Just tried once again to use this vacuum to clean my car and am very disappointed in the suction, or lack of. Also, I’m trying to purchase a new filter and can’t find one anywhere online, not even Dirt Devil’s web site. Apparently I have to wait until Monday morning to call them.... it’s only 5:30pm PST on a Friday and they’re not open. Very inconvenient, just for a filter. Also it’s my understanding that the filters cost $7-9 each. Too high! I would not recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Only works properly 1/4 of the time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few month ago and have spent more time fixing it than being able to use it. When it's working the roller feature is awesome. The problem, it stops constantly. If it isn't rolling there isn't any suction. My old Black and Decker for $25 bucks could pick up dry kitty food. This one picks it up and then throws it back out in small pieces. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: LeAndra

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: What good is a dustbuster that doesn't vacuum up cereal or other small toddler related messes? I am so disappointed in this little vacuum! I was so tired of pulling out the big vacuum and unwinding the cord every time there was a little snack mess... all the cereal get caught in the front part of the vacuum and clog it up instead of letting them all go in. Absolutely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: SaraMeg7

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, good power
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this better would be a retractable cord for charging. I had to label the charger because I have so many things that need charging that they get lost. The front, suction part, however, is a bit in need of some re-design. It pulls the dirt in but then leaves some of it squeezed at the front of the nozzle where there are a few screws. Had to use a small tool to pull it out. I like the flip-up extender, but it should snap in place once you flip it down for use. I have to keep holding it with one hand because it moves up and down instead of remaining locked in place.
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't suck
customer_reviews.text: There are some good features with this vacuum. The small size is nice as are the attachments that make this a useful tool for light cleanup work. The reason I've given it only 3 stars however, is that the battery drains incredibly fast and you may only get a few minutes of work out of it before it needs to be plugged in again. Also, the suction is mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: surfgoat

customer_reviews.title: Disposable vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Manual says you need a replacement filter model f101, which is now out of stock everywhere. A replacement filter f4 with adapter is not to be found either. Since I bought this vacuum two months (!) ago, I would have expected replacement parts to be available! Buy something else, this is not worth your money..
customer_reviews.author: Hostilia

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My boat upholstery on my pontoon was covered in spider webs, dead mini bug webs. and some kind of white threads, plus pollen, dust, and airborne dirt. Swiffers and other dusters didn't help. But my new Dirt Devil did! It has a sturdy upholstery tool, and also a crevice tool which is perfect for between the cushions. So delighted with my new cleaning device!! It also cleaned my porch cushions, which also had airborne dirt, dust, and pollen, and it all came clean instantly. I've been disappointed with mini hand vacs in the past, this is the first one that actually works as hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: POP

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in November 2017. I had one previous with regular batteries but it didn't last long at all. It's performance was also lacking. I purchased the lithium battery model hoping for better performance. The lithium battery model did perform a lot better. I really liked it. Then after about one year the 110 volt wall charger quit working. I then replaced it with another charger. The vac lasted about another 6 months and finally died. I really liked this vac but cannot recommend it because of only lasting around 1.5 years. I will look for another company the next time.
customer_reviews.author: R Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Saw this product had decent reviews. The bad reviews were about battery and how it would shut up. There was only a handful of those so I decided to get it. Received the product and tried to vacuum my car for the first time. Within less than 60 seconds the vacuum turned off. My thoughts were “oh maybe it doesn’t come precharged” so I charged it and then 3 weeks later decided to try it again. Well as of yesterday, it was fully charged and the filter was clean, it did not work. It kept turning off within less than a minute. I hate writing poor reviews but this was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous model
customer_reviews.text: Works well but very loud. Bought to replace the previous model, but this one stops up easier, has a difficult to use plug into the handle recharger (previous model had a cool charging base that could be wall mounted), and had a shorter flip out snout which means more bending over to reach the same areas than before. All the changes point to cost savings for the manufacturer, at the cost of the customer. Definitely a step backwards from the previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Biddie

customer_reviews.title: Very awkward for wall mounting, no wall mount solution available.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to vacuum up my electronics workbench between sessions. I need to inspect the contents before emptying it. It's pretty good for that. I don't like the flip tool. What I really want is a way to attach a hose. But my main complaint about this unit is that it's very hard to mount on a wall. I don't even want a wall charger, I just want a good way to hang it up. So it works pretty well, the flip thing gets in my way a lot, and the best I've been able to do for hanging is to put a loop on the handle and hang it from a hook.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Having major problems keeping a charge. Called Dirt Devil soon as after purchase said to unplug 5 min replug and charge. Did that worked for a while now not working. Have only had 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Browning

customer_reviews.title: Big Changes
customer_reviews.text: My new Dirt Devil works fine, but there were quite a few changes from my previous Dirt Devil purchased in 2011. The new model does not have a charging pad so you have to connect a charging chord each time you use it. This takes more time. The crevice tool on the new Dirt Devil snaps into it's storage position, but I found it extremely difficult to release it. My old Dirt Devil had a release button that worked very well. The new Dirt Devil did come with one attachment that my old model did not have. My take away is that the manufacturer was trying to save money on production costs.
customer_reviews.author: Look Back Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: Not strong enough for my needs, my dog is a Lab and sheds a lot. I was hoping to use it on the carpeted steps but didn’t work very well. It’s been put back in the box. Wasted money for my needs
customer_reviews.author: teri

customer_reviews.title: You probably don't want this.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. It didn't have much suction and the charge didn't last long enough for the kids to vacuum the stairs (which was the purpose for which this was purchased). It's probably ok for a quick spill pickup but do you really want a separate unit cluttering up your house just for the time when a kid spills cherrios and squishes a few on the couch?
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a car or couch and stairs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car when I uber. It’s great. I can vacuum the entire car with 1 full battery. The brush attachment works great and the crevice tool does the job in those hard to reach areas and cracks. I use it on my couch and stairs at home also. All around great little vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: mike knows best

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum after 13 months
customer_reviews.text: We've had this vacuum for 13 months and it's been awesome so far. We use it on a daily basis (two kids under 4...) and it gets the job done. The charge holds longer than I thought it would and the suction is great. It's not going to pick up any bowling balls but the suction is quite strong. Also don't be an idiot like many of the other reviewers here and complain about the price of a new filter. Just take the filter out every few uses and shake it out well and you won't need to replace the filter. I will update this review if the vacuum stops working at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison D.

customer_reviews.title: Dirt Devil Quick Flip Plus Cordless 16 Volt...  Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, powerful. I like the upholstery attachment. Great price. I think I iwll keep it. ** UPDATE: I have used it for small jobs. But It does not run long on a full charge. My guess is that you will be able to do 10-15 30 second quick pickups. Then you will have to recharge it for 6 hours because it will run completely down and stop in the middle of a cleanup. Sorry. I had to demote this hand vac.
customer_reviews.author: hombre243Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Coin-flip reliability. Pay more for a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first 2 times, then quickly lost suction. We've tried cleaning out the filter, fully charging the batteries, and making sure there is no dust/hair trapped in the intake, but this hardly has any power left after only a few weeks. The powered brush attachment worked sporadically, at best, even from the beginning. Shoddy product with almost no warranty. All the other 1-star's are accurate, apparently there's a huge reliability issue with this product and it's a coin-toss as to whether or not you get a decent run of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I want to return it as it will no longer hold a charge or stay put together....
customer_reviews.text: I want to return it as it will no longer hold a charge or stay put together....This was a horrible mistake and I am late in trying it out and seeing the short length of time I was able to use it....Very disappointing. Please call or write me about this product....it should not last only 3 months of service...I am a very good customer and your window of time does not take into account the length of time something works...if the charge doesn't work or light up....I want to buy one that is not like this was and want this one returned...Please advise...thanks so very much, Judy ( :
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Wow, my new baby.
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little vacuum despite it being handheld and cordless. Don't let the Chinese-based vacuums fool you--I bought a brand-less vacuum rated a 5-star from people "who weren't paid to leave a review and received the item for free". The car vacuum only lasted a month and a waste of $20. So why not shell out a couple more dollars from a recognizable brand name vacuum with limited warranty? So far it has exceeded my expectations and has done a cleaning job beautifully. I will happily leave a review after a couple more months of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Sidera

customer_reviews.title: Search no further...
customer_reviews.text: After sending back 2 other hand vacs that were below average we were happy to finally get one that actually does what it says it does! I spent hours researching different hand vacuums and was so happy with this purchase! Powerful suction, easy to attach and use crevice tool and stair cleaner, & charges quickly! Great buy for the price! No need to search any further this is the best hand vacuum on the market under $100.
customer_reviews.author: Bran C

customer_reviews.title: Medium duty handheld vaccum
customer_reviews.text: As many stated, battery life isn't the best. I generally only run in for a few minutes at a time, so as long as you keep it plugged in it's no big deal. I would be much happier if the suction was better. It's no replacement for the on board tools of my standard vacuum cleaner, but for what i need it for it's OK for now.. If I to purchase another i'd probably not buy this unit again.
customer_reviews.author: Brando Commando

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs on wooden floors!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely convenient for quick pickups! For longer jobs, It’s super light so your arms won’t get tired, off of a full charge you could probably use it for 45 minutes straight. The only issue that I have noticed , is the small rubber flap that opens and closes into the part for all the gunk goes, can get caught on tiny items pretty quickly and then you won’t be able to suction anything until you clear it out.
customer_reviews.author: K McFall

customer_reviews.title: It Simply Quit Working!
customer_reviews.text: Based on past experience, I expected better from Dirt Devil and I certainly expected a hand vac used for moderate to light jobs to last longer than 13 months. Unfortunately many products arent built to last anymore, which is why warranties are so heavily promoted. I'm done with Dirt Devil.
customer_reviews.author: SignedV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the small things that upright vacuums can't do easily
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how great this vacuum is for getting cat fur off of carpeted stairs and the crevice tool nicely gets things in corners or between wood floor slats. Does exactly what I wanted it to do at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Great suction power and battery life
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has good suction power for hard to reach corners. It’s great at cleaning up everyday messes. I use it on the couches, area rug, dining room chairs even the floors. It’s a lifesaver! And lasts long on the charge.
customer_reviews.author: ladydnyce

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A LITTLE POWERHOUSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like vacuums and I especially like them when they do what they are suppose to do and don't cost an arm and a leg. Don't be fooled by the price, this is a powerful vacuum that out performs many large vacuums! I like the Dirt Devil brand and this one doesn't disappoint. Suction is great and works great with cat litter, stairs, furniture and in the car. Extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: t. prouty

customer_reviews.title: does not charge
customer_reviews.text: Item was left not plugged in for one night. When plugged back in to charge it will not charge. Totally useless. Need information as to how to return for a new one. Please advise what action I need to take. This was purchased in late December and has had minimal usage. Thank you Edward F. Watts, Jr. efwjr03@comcast.net
customer_reviews.author: Edward F. Watts, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Small power sucker
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum to use in our RV. It is easy to use in the RV. It does a great job, and my wife insisted that we also use it in our house. It is very portable. Battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: jacog17

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts for many small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Battery seems last quite a while for small jobs. I use it to clean my work bench and work areas after messy jobs, mostly saw dust and foam carving debris. I particularly like the onboard crevise tool although its difficult to fold down. The clips that hold it in place are very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: It sucks... in a bad way
customer_reviews.text: 10 month review: worthless. It’s a great noise maker. 0 suction power. 0. Please don’t waste your money. I don’t write many reviews and my expectations are always in line with the cheap goods being pushed on consumers, but this thing is less effective than going over your rug using a beverage straw.
customer_reviews.author: qwertyytrewq

customer_reviews.title: Works great, charges fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great, charges fast, maintains power for long enough to clean probably a couple dorm room sized rooms, or out in the car. The small extension is attached to the vacuum which is awesome, because who hasn't lost these after a while. The other attachment works fairly well for carpet. I wouldn't want to do a whole room on it, but works well to get dirt out of your car's carpet/mats. And it's a brand name that's been around forever, so I imagine if you did have a problem, their customer service is probably better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Compact. Filter is washable. Good for boat.
customer_reviews.text: I like the power, aggressive sweeper attachment, washable filter and size. I use this on my sailboat. It does a great job helping control my dogs hair. I also like the sweeper attachment for the cushions. I do store this compare vac in a plastic bag when stowing it to ensure the marine environment does shorten the vac's life. My wife likes it so much, she wants one for quick clean ups at home.
customer_reviews.author: dubo

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on may the 11th. In the handful of times I have used it I have been disappointed to say the least. This thing loses suction after about 5 passes on ANY kind of dirt. Spent more time taking it apart(spilling half what I just picked up)to get whatever is clogging the TINY holes around the filter. When I FINALLY am about 80% finished with my tiny job the battery runs out for a total of about 7-10min of actual run time(sustained run time of about 4 min). I'm not 3 days past my "Return" date so I'm S.O.L.. All I can do it try to warn u all not to waste ur money
customer_reviews.author: tom Peters

customer_reviews.title: Horrible On/Off Button Design 👎👎 Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: The on/off button on this dirt devil is the WORST. It is very hard to turn on or off. Button feels junky and cheap. Buy at your own risk. Suction power is great. Battery life I am not too sure about as it is still pretty new. Once you turn it on (if you can) it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Four by Four

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the quick flip
customer_reviews.text: Hoooo Doggie. This little thing does the job. It's not as powerful as your regular vacuum, but it is not a regular vacuum. Keep that in mind. However, this little bugger really gets into the corners and along the edges, and is perfect for vacuuming out the window grates. I'm pretty much in love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeeeeeee my little dirt devil. Gets in all the nooks and crannies in my sons car seat and high chair! Pesky crumbs drive me nuts but this little sucker makes it all better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction power is ok but not great. Batterie life is quite good
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is ok but not great. Batterie life is quite good. The big problem is the little red part in the front to get into tiny spots: It works but it is very hard to get out from the top of the hand vacuum. If you use your fingers, you will definitely bruise your fingertips. My nails turned purple, every time I tried to move that little red part off the top. Now, I use a screwdriver to get it loose.
customer_reviews.author: gp2x

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This is great for quick clean up jobs. Has good suction and battery life. I've used it, left it unplugged, picked it up a day later and used it again with no loss of power. I do empty it often. You need to be careful to pull the inner cup filter out and clean it every time, too. Can't really speak to its durability yet, I've only had it a few months. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Poor engineering
customer_reviews.text: On/off switch & flip nozzle were defective. The on/off switch was intermittent. The flip nozzle was so hard to pull out that we had to try several times before we could get it to work & it pilled out so hard it almost broke off. What a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty finding filter replacement
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new filter for my dirt devil. I used the product information I received with vacuum to find correct replacement part #. I then logged onto the dirt devil website and unable to find the part # in the search menu. I emailed dirt devil and did receive a reply back giving me the correct replacement part # (Filter, F-101, $2.40) and told the part is on backorder and to try back in 30 days. I have seen similar reviews (old and newer) here with same issue and wonder if anyone has been successful at eventually obtaining the part through dirt devil? If not, any success finding the part anywhere else?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets My High Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once but it meets all my standards: lightweith, no assembly required other than the 1 attachment, easy to charge, built in crevice tool, powerful suction. I used it to clean crumbs out of my stove storage area but I can tell it's going to serve me very well wherever I use it.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Shop around, this isn’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is very poor, so is the suction, I would suggest shopping around , I’m sure there are better options
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Dirt Devil. I have 2 one for my sewing room and other other I keep in the kitchen for quick clean ups. You do have to be careful with the QuickFlip crevice tool. The little nobs that hold it in place can break easily if you are not careful.
customer_reviews.author: LittleWitch

customer_reviews.title: Well so far it is working fine for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this other people said I shouldn't have gotten it. Well so far it is working fine for what I need it for. I'm not trying to pick up marbles & rocks with it. Now if this thing dies next month, Then I'll say something about it.
customer_reviews.author: P. M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Practical, good enough to suction dust, dog hair and sand in your couch or your car. The roller helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: CharlyD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Dirt Devil vacuum. So nice to use for those quick little spots and not have to haul out the big vacuum or worry about a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa DeWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Held Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My third attempt at buying a little vacuum for the little jobs and finally found one that works as advertised. Good suction, charges fast. Does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Good hand held vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. A lot better then black and decker. Good suction. Easy cleaning. And lasts for a good amount of time after done charging I use it for light work. Only picking up pet fur and light amounts of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: kdogg300

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Handheld Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This little baby is awesome. I was looking for something to replace my old Dustbuster and this fits the bill and then some. Holds a charge pretty well and the attachment is great for small, tight places. Good power for more vacuuming and the wife likes it! That's good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Good car cleaner but pinched my finger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum for quick pick-ups and cleaning the car. The battery lasted long enough to vacuum one car. One thing I do not like is the Quick Flip - it has pinched my finger every time I've pulled it down and it doesn't really snap into place, just wobbles around. I guess that makes it more flexible, but I'm not a fan of the design.
customer_reviews.author: polywog6

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to quick vacuum messes and for my bathroom & front door rugs. It has way too little power to suck up anything off of my rugs, and takes 3 times as long as it should to get anything up. After "vacuuming" my rug, I picked it up and shook it, and dirt fell off in the floor everywhere. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts just 20 minutes Good suction Good for hair and pet hair Noise ok ...
customer_reviews.text: Charge for more than 3 hours (until the light stops blinking) Battery lasts just 20 minutes Good suction Good for hair and pet hair Noise ok Disappointed about the battery
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: A lemon!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few uses. Now it will only turn on for 2 seconds at a time. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amac

customer_reviews.title: This product stopped working after only a few uses and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after only a few uses and less than one month. We bought a black and decker after this one failed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: great hand vac, almost better than my regular vacuum! very strong suction, good size (a tiny bit heavy), nice features. actually makes you want to use it, haha!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for small jobs and stairs. I have nerve damage in my arms and hands and have difficulty navigating stairs with larger, heavier components. This vacuum picks up dog hair and dirt very well. I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Works well, dogs hate it!
customer_reviews.text: The little flip down suction beak works well. I use it to clean up after my obnoxious dogs who refuse to eat over their food bowl but instead bring it to the nearest rug or carpeted room. Works well and doesn't seem to need to be charged often. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed: Small compartment size.
customer_reviews.text: This has a very small compartment so it doesnt hold much. It's not close to the full sized ones. I was really disappointed. It must be dumped frequently. I had to purchase another dirt devil that was full sized.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE, Died after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It died after 5 weeks, it will no longer charge. And it is conveniently right outside the return policy date. It's a waste of money. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Pici

customer_reviews.title: Only 30 day warranty,
customer_reviews.text: The attachment part no longer worked after a handful of usea. I contacted the manufacturer and they would not help because product was more than 30 days since purchase. They offered for me to purchase a replacement part for $20.00. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Debra Quin

customer_reviews.title: Won’t suck up toast crumbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a ten year old hand held vacuum. Even from new this thing would barely suck toast crumbs off the counter. The filter plugs very easily and then it barely moves any air. The little flapper in the dirt holder that keeps the dirt from coming out when its off doesn’t have an opening big enough for anything of any size to get through.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: quit working
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum quit working when I used it the 3rd time. It stays running for about 5 seconds and turns off. Useless. I should have returned immediately or tried to find out from seller my options but I think I waited too long. I would not recommend it based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: T3268

customer_reviews.title: Great Picker-Upper
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and holds a charge for a decent period of time. I use it constantly to clean up the dust that accumulates around my computer system and cords. Easily cleans up the dust and dirt and keeps the area very clean. Easy to empty, easy to recharge, and has a nice attachement for chairs and couches. I'm glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: DooWopFan

customer_reviews.title: Great device.  No replacement filter available.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Powerful. Long-lasting battery. Love the power head. Cannot find a replacement filter for the interior suction cone??? Called the manufacturer. No luck. The filter is not built like Fort Know, so why is no replacement available?
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for quick clean up on our rugs, also tile floor in kitchen and stairs. Works great for the car too. Seems to hold a charge for quite awhile. The rotating brush attachment really helps.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: It charged faster then the six hours I PURCHASED TWO ...
customer_reviews.text: It charged faster then the six hours I PURCHASED TWO for a summer residence I wanted it for my vents and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: bookettes

customer_reviews.title: this one seems to be the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Keep going thru these vacs, this one seems to be the best one yet. Others were another model and manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M. Bonn

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power
customer_reviews.text: How this was one of the most highly rated, I don’t know. I would like to say it sucks, but unfortunately it doesn’t. It whimpers along.
customer_reviews.author: guglielmos.

customer_reviews.title: Genneunctional but could be better designed
customer_reviews.text: This serves its purpose but the battery doesn't last as long as I expected. Also there are some weird tight spots inside the bin so when I try to empty it, a lot of things remain in the grooves. This can be annoying when it is perishable food bits and also tiny bits of broken glass because you can't empty it now but it'll eventually either become rotten or loosen after you forgot there are tiny pieces of broken glass you had vacuumed up previously.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last one full minute on a complete charge. Disappointed.....
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Best hand vac ever
customer_reviews.text: THE ABSOLUTE BEST HAND VAC EVER MANUFACTURED. WOW.....There is nothing negative about this at all. First time ever I bought something that was so well designed. It is not a quiet product, but who cares, it gets the job done !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa36

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I wasn't expecting this to be that useful. The battery lasts long enough to be used for a few minutes for several days. Easy to use, easy to clean, fast to charge.
customer_reviews.author: diegoj

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice unit. The mouth is a little small for ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly out of the box, after charging as instructed. It is a very nice unit. The mouth is a little small for some purposes, and it seems too nice to use in my garage. But performs well, and am still on the first battery charge after about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: RandyJ

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for about a month. Now it hardly sucks up anything. So basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Filters NOT Readlly Available
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works ok, but you must go directly to the manufacture and over pay for the filter. It appears that cost effective filters are not available. I would not buy again and can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C,

customer_reviews.title: Great for small messes
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase! It is perfect for cleaning up after my 2 under 2. Not too loud so easy to pull out and not scare the babies. It's great to clean up after snacks and meals
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: not effective!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Senior and it is difficult for me to handle a lot of things - I got a dust buster because it would help me pick up dust on base boards- -problem- when I turn on to pick up dust it only stays on for a second- this is no help to me I give dirt devil a zero
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little vac
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little vac. Bought it for quick cleanup's when I'm doing my plant inspections. I love that it has the flip out crevice tool
customer_reviews.author: Rosie2012

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: So practical! Use it to clean the inside of my car, upholstery, picking up crumbs, etc. it’s a helpful and handy time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Niña lista!

customer_reviews.title: Great portable handheld vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Small compact and handy. Quick clean up of small dusty cooking, car, work bench dust, etc. Great item. Marc
customer_reviews.author: Marc Gillmore

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the ease of charging it and carrying it. I wish the intake part is was a little bigger because it gets clogged often but it does the job well if its literally for crumbs or dust. Solid pieces the size of beans may become an issue in large amounts. Overall great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Maria Castro

customer_reviews.title: Like it just wish battery lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: Its a really good mini vacuum so I dont have to constantly bring out the big vacuum. It takes forever to fully charge and then I only get 30 minutes use out if it. Wish the battery lasted longer, but I like it besides that.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Sluder

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: We like it a lot and use it for cleaning out the car or the golf cart and small messes in the house. So glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Camille D. Haro

customer_reviews.title: Power
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed at the lack of power. The product description lead me to believe that it would be more powerful. My old unit has more power.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Delivered Apr 18, 2019, died June 7th 2019. While it was working, the suction was ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: HappyToBeMe

customer_reviews.title: Still considering it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased July 17,2017. I thought I was getting a powerful dust buster, better than my old Dirt Devil that was not as powerful. Well, it stopped working after a few uses. It may be the cord was not properly attached. My husband and I puzzled over it. Then suddenly it came to life. We will see how long that works.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I use it all the time, mostly with the flip down nozzle for tight places, brush attachment works great. Excellent for the car as well as the steps in the house. Stays charged a long time but does take a lot of time to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK if you will rarely use it or only use it for very small messes
customer_reviews.text: The pet hair extension stopped working after about two months. The mouth is very narrow, so unless your messes are rare/tiny, I wouldn't recommend this for frequent use. We have two cats and even when the pet hair extension was working it took several passes over a couch to get all the hair. Ended up buying another one for about $120 and it was well worth the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Klibisz

customer_reviews.title: Compact, light Dirt Devil
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. Easy to use and to keep the filter clean. Seems to last quite awhile on one charge and recharges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: WalkWizard

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it for a while now and it works good at lifting up hair from a couch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: portable
customer_reviews.text: It sucks! and that is what it is supposed to do. the intake could be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: It's good for light duty applications
customer_reviews.text: They vaccum works okay, it doesn't have a lot of suction power and the battery doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Smith

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and takes care of the Job
customer_reviews.text: I had already 3 others like this and it is the best available in the market for a good price. Vacuum in general usually are extremely expensive in my view and this is affordable and efficient. It really worth the money and the battery has long life too.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: Lots of battery, great suction. I would like to see Dirt Devil make a wall mount for this portable.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Great little Devil
customer_reviews.text: Great little device. I use this daily and get about 20+ minutes on a full charge. Suction is really good and cleans out my car quite nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold charge, it's hyper sensitive when being charged, utterly unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Stewie

product_meta.title: Dirt Devil Plus 16V, Red Quick Flip Pro Cordless 16 Volt Lithium Ion Bagless Handheld Vacuum Cleaner BD30025B
product_meta.description: Style Name:Vacuum OnlyQuick pick-ups are even easier with the Dirt Devil QuickFlip Plus Bagless Hand Vacuum. It’s packed with power, portability and accessories. A powered stair and upholstery tool attaches in a second for effective stair and upholstery cleaning. Plus a crevice tool flips out for hard to reach spots. Best of all, the QuickFlip Plus is powered by a 16V lithium battery giving you the ultimate cordless freedom plus faster charge time and a fade-free long lasting battery. What’s that mean for you? A swift and hassle-free clean.
feature_bullets: 16 volt lithium battery with 2x faster charging time
QuickFlip crevice tool is attached to the unit to reach debris in tight corners
Attach the powered turbo tool to quickly clean stairs and upholstery
Power indicator lets you know when it's time to re-charge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,078 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
